page.title: 03THE METROPOLITAN RAILWAY
page.content: The{Metropolitan Railway}reached{ {Rickmansworth}in{1874}but the section beyond wasn't{electrified until 1962.} Going to{London}on the train has a lot of advantages over the car.From Mr.Bulgin's point of view,trains are cheaper,more relaxing and very reliable.It is also much quicker at rush-hours.He moved here because of the good service the trains provided. The price of a year-ticket{to London from{Rickmansworth}is{Â£648:00,}and this is a fair price.He first used the Metropolitan railway in{1953},and over the last{15 years}he has used it regularly for{9 years}.He gets in the same carriage but does not specially meet anyone.In a survey,{55%}of those questioned moved here because of the reliable trains.Also,{43%}use the{ {Metropolitan railway}regularly to commute to work.
